quests.name: Stoke the Reservoir
quests.description: Glazecaller Ilyss fears the ember warden beneath the atrium will overheat the lumen channels. Defeat the construct in the reservoir and return with its resonant core to restore balance.

reward_items.name: Ilyss's Ember Sigil
reward_items.description: A palm-sized sigil that glows warmly, marking you as a steward of the reservoir.

quests.completion_message: Ilyss seals the core within a channeling prism and nods approvingly. "The reservoir hums in balance once more."

quests.name: Chart the Murmuring Veins
quests.description: Master of Echoes Neral needs fresh resonance surveys from the newly opened underworks to understand where the lumen tide is faltering.

reward_items.name: Underwork Cartographer's Loop
reward_items.description: A braided cord of resonance beads that glows when you near unmapped passages.

quests.completion_message: Neral layers the records across a spinning sequencer. "With these choruses aligned we can calm the deeper pulses."

quests.name: Still the Resonant Warden
quests.description: A rogue warden is amplifying turbulence within the surging reservoir. Defeat the construct and deliver its stabilized core to Neral before the underworks fracture.

reward_items.name: Sequencer's Stabilizer
reward_items.description: An attunement rod that halves the time it takes to balance a lumen surge at any kiln.

quests.completion_message: Neral settles the core into the harmonic kilnworks. "Feel that? The underworks are singing back in tune."

quests.name: Weave the Beacon Choir
quests.description: Beacon Keeper Iress requests charged skyloom filaments and a pacified tempest whisper so the beacon choir can broadcast safe routes across the night sky.

reward_items.name: Beacon Choir Baton
reward_items.description: A baton woven with skyloom strands that lets you recall any beacon's guiding melody.

quests.completion_message: Iress threads the filaments through the lanterns and smiles. "Listenâ€”the city now knows the safest winds to follow."
